short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ads and pop-ups blocker for YouTube, Facebook and other sites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ad Blocker is an effective tool for blocking ads on various platforms such as YouTube, Facebook, Twitch and many other popular sites.

✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭

FEATURES

⮚ Provides data protection and blocks trackers from third-party sites.
⮚ Don't worry about intrusive and dangerous ads - our program will protect you from malware, scammers and cryptomanners on the Internet.
⮚ Enjoy your online experience without intrusive pop-ups, banner ads and video ads by blocking your favorite sites including YouTube, Facebook and Twitch.
⮚ Speed up page loads by blocking ads and other resources to help make the Internet faster and more efficient for you.
⮚ Keep track of how many resources are blocked and which ones thanks to our program.


✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭

ABOUT THE PRODUCT
 
Install Ad Blocker and enjoy the Internet without ads. In addition, AdBlock protects your browser from malware and protects your personal information by preventing advertisers from accessing your search history.

Ad Blocker for Chrome provides automatic functionality. Just click on "Add to Chrome", then visit your favorite site to make sure ads no longer interfere with your online experience.

✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭✭

IMPORTANT
A notification requesting access to your browsing history and information about sites visited appears automatically because AdBlock works in all tabs. However, AdBlock does not track your browsing history and does not require your personal information for it to work.
